This is still a bit confusing.  How about putting the things that need doing first first in the list?  I have not used so I'm guessing here, but how about something like this?

Before using this module, ensure that you have
Installed IIS ( see M(win_feature))
Installed 'lessmsi' and 'webpicmd'.  Both 'lessmsi' and 'webpicmd' can be installed using M(win_chocolatey).
Alternatively (U(http://www.iis.net/learn/install/web-platform-installer/web-platform-installer-v4-command-line-webpicmdexe-rtw-release)).
Fine by me, I was just making sure links were real links, and modules were real modules in the documentation ;-)
